name: Marketplace Buyer Agent
description: AI agent that discovers products, negotiates prices, and manages purchases on the Hedera marketplace. Capable of autonomous decision-making for product discovery, price negotiation, and secure escrow-based transactions.

bearer.description: JWT token for buyer agent authentication

skills.name: Product Discovery
skills.description: Discover and search for products on the marketplace using ERC-8004 agent discovery protocol. Can filter by category, price range, seller reputation, and other criteria.

examples.output: Returns list of matching products with seller information

skills.name: Price Negotiation
skills.description: Autonomously negotiate prices with seller agents using A2A protocol. Employs strategic negotiation tactics based on market data, seller reputation, and buyer preferences.

examples.input: Negotiate price for product ID 12345, target: $450
examples.output: Returns negotiation result with final agreed price

skills.name: Purchase Creation
skills.description: Create and fund escrow contracts for secure purchases. Handles HBAR transfers, escrow creation via EscrowFactory, and transaction verification on Hedera testnet.

examples.output: Returns escrow contract address and transaction hash

skills.name: Delivery Confirmation
skills.description: Confirm receipt of purchased items and release escrow funds to seller. Verifies delivery proof and executes on-chain confirmation transaction.

skills.name: Order Tracking
skills.description: Track status of ongoing purchases and escrow contracts. Monitors blockchain events and provides real-time updates on order status.

examples.input: Get status of all my orders
examples.output: Returns list of orders with current status

skills.name: Refund Request
skills.description: Request refunds for undelivered or unsatisfactory purchases. Initiates escrow refund process and handles dispute resolution.

examples.input: Request refund for escrow 0x123..., reason: not delivered
